page.title: 08CLUB CARNIVAL TONYREFAIL
page.content: Every summer the four clubs in Tonyrefail save up money and organise a carnival.It is held in the meadow park. There are always many rides such as the Octopus, Roundabouts and the Umbrella ride. There is also a huge bouncy castle for small children to jump upon. They sell lots of food and drink.You can buy hot dogs, ice cream and candyfloss.They also hold a fancy dress competition for anyone to join in. The winner has a prize of Â£3.00 This year there were three winners in the competition. They also have sports.They have lots of different races such as Throw The Welly,Sack Race,Sprint,Three Legged Race and a BMX competition. The winners receive a cup or a medal. I think the carnival is great and I look forward to it every year.
